Class KaraWorld

java.lang.Object
  greenfoot.World
      KaraWorld

public class KaraWorld
extends greenfoot.World

This class creates a world for Kara. It contains settings for height and width of the world and initializes the Actors.

Author:
Marco Jakob (http://code.makery.ch)

public KaraWorld()
Creates a world for Kara.

KaraWorld

public KaraWorld(int worldWidth,
                 int worldHeight)
Creates an empty world for Kara with specified width and height.

Parameters:
worldWidth - Number of horizontal cells
worldHeight - Number of vertical cells
Method Detail

clearFieldBackground

protected void clearFieldBackground()
Removes the background tiles.

createFieldBackground

protected void createFieldBackground()
Initializes the background tiles with the field icon.

initActorsFromWorldSetup

protected void initActorsFromWorldSetup(WorldSetup worldSetup)
Initializes the actors based on actor information in the specified WorldSetup.

prepare

protected void prepare()
Prepares the world, i.e. creates all initial actors. If a world setup is available, it is loaded.

This method may be overridden by subclasses to provide their own means to initialize actors, e.g. by calling #addObject().

printWorldSetupToConsole

public void printWorldSetupToConsole()
Prints the world setup to the console.

saveWorldSetupToFile

public void saveWorldSetupToFile()
Saves the world setup to a file that the user can choose.

toASCIIText

protected java.lang.String toASCIIText()
Creates an ASCII-representation of all the actors in the world.

Returns:
the world as ASCII text
